pr_title: Remove foreign keys on entity id

timeline.message:
add getProxyAccount and getAutoRenewAccount to TransactionHandler

Signed-off-by: Apekshit Sharma <apekshit.sharma@hedera.com>

add getProxyAccount and getAutoRenewAccount to TransactionHandler

Signed-off-by: Apekshit Sharma <apekshit.sharma@hedera.com>

migrate txns using new table

Signed-off-by: Apekshit Sharma <apekshit.sharma@hedera.com>
Use encoded ids in js to remove unnecessary joins.

timeline.bodyText: We should later convert this id to EntityId
timeline.author: steven-sheehy

timeline.bodyText: We should be using JPA Attribute Converters to automatically do the conversion for these two fields.
timeline.author: steven-sheehy

replies.bodyText:
sounds good.
Added decode function.
Had also added converter, however changing these two fields snowball 10+ changes in tests. Let's do as a followup. Removed converter from this change since it'll be dead code as part of this change.
replies.author: apeksharma

timeline.bodyText: Same comment. Use JPA Attribute Converter
timeline.author: steven-sheehy

timeline.bodyText: There's probably a ton of duplicate entities inserted as a result of this change especially for node and treasury IDs that might slow things down a bit. Would definitely be better to batch this in a list or use JPA/transactions to batch.
timeline.author: steven-sheehy

replies.bodyText:
right. Planned to do it with exploring optimization on t_ctl table.
Created #820 for both which will be followup of this PR.
replies.author: apeksharma

timeline.bodyText: Since you'll have to pass this entity to EntityListener soon anyway, this suggests that EntityListener.onEntityId(EntityId) should really be EntityListener.onEntity(Entities) to be reusable by both.
timeline.author: steven-sheehy

replies.bodyText:
onEntity was what i added first. But then i wasn't sure if two cases will be satisfiable by single fn in EntityListener

insert .... do nothing if exists : for proxy acc and auto renew acc
update ... : for entity updates

Decided to add specific fn for the insert... case being added in this PR. We'll definitely share the two if possible. Let's see when the second one is migrated.
replies.author: apeksharma

timeline.bodyText: You don't need the @Query anymore as it overrides the parent method and just adds caching.
timeline.author: steven-sheehy

timeline.message:
Use encoded ids in js to remove unnecessary joins.

timeline.bodyText:
q: Do we have protection from negative shard, realm and num values?
I think we do since contents are from record file but if not you should add coverage for negative longs so we at least capture the expected behaviour in case of bugs
timeline.author: Nana-EC

replies.bodyText: not sure. added checks for it in #824
replies.author: apeksharma
